Html:
Hi,

Any thoughts as to why this VB code doesn't turn an overlay On/Off

Private Sub cboxTrack_CheckedChanged(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles cboxTrack.CheckedChanged 

       If frmLoading Then Exit Sub

       If cboxTrack.Checked Then

            map.Overlays.Add(ovCourse)

        Else

            map.Overlays.Remove(ovCourse)

        End If

        map.Invalidate()

    End Sub

PS: ovCourse is instantiated at form level

Anyone...
tried debug step by step and it hit your wanted lines?
Sorted thanks, dumb question really. My problem not yours
